title: Hash Rate - Ep 113 - TAOFu Subnet Seeds

rawLines.text: Hello everybody and welcome to Hashrate.
My name is Mark Jeffrey. My guests today
are Matt and Mitch from Tau. Hello
gentlemen. How you doing? How's it
going? Great to see you. Thanks for
having us. So uh so Matt, you and I met
actually out at Endgame uh like I guess
it's a month ago now. Crazy how long
it's been. Doesn't feel like it's been
that long, but it feels like it was last
week. Yeah. I'm still catching up from
all the all the sort of inbound that
came came from that. I'm sure. So, it's
great to meet all the subnetss, but now
everybody's everybody's like, "Pick me,
daddy. Pick me. Put me on the show.
Everybody wants to be on." Yeah. I mean,
that's great. I mean, I I'm I'm
definitely flattered, but it's it's a
lot to catch up on. Let's talk a little
bit about Tau. So, um there is there is
a problem in the subnet universe. Um in
the you know in the in the early days of
subnets uh the subnets received Tao
tokens you know as as emissions you know
sort of like Bitcoin miners receive
Bitcoin tokens when they mine Bitcoin.
So the Tao subnets all receive TOAO
tokens which they would sell a lot of
them to sort of uh keep their operations
up and running much like Bitcoin miners
sell Bitcoin to keep their operations up
and running. It's not necessarily a
horrible thing, but it does tend to sort

we're now that we've launched alpha

owners receive emissions in the form of
their own alpha tokens for their own
subnet. And so a lot of them are now
forced to sell those alpha tokens
specifically for their subnet, which
depresses the price of their subnet

of one thing when we were everybody was
selling Tao and it was sort of you know
spread out equally among uh you know the
selling pressure was affecting only one

tokens in order to survive and this has
created a problem. So you guys came

we have I think we have an answer to

Yeah. Um, so like you said earlier, um,
it was really easy for a lot of bigger

sustain themselves cuz they kept on
getting like these missions. Um, and now

your alpha tokens as a subnet owner um
